metadata.synopsis: Generic reactions to Selune items such as amulets, idols, earrings and weapons
metadata.how_to_trigger: Loot a Selunite item that doesn't have custom reactivity or isn't a book.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Selûnite. Strange, seeing  such an item in a new light.
0.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Selûne. Fit only for a rubbish pile.
1.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Moonwitch rubbish. Ought to be burned.
2.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: Selûnite. I would have looked on this with scorn, once...
3.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Strange. I would have scoffed at such a thing, once.
4.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: I would have destroyed this in Shar's name once. But no longer.
5.context: NodeContext: On looking at an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) . Thoughtful/a little conflicted. She's turned from Shar, but that doesn't necessarily mean she's putting her faith in Selune.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.context: NodeContext: Derisive, reacting to an item related to Selune (jewellery, idol, weapon etc) Arc - SH remained loyal to Shar.
